altername_name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Ayanami Ikusei Keikaku
Neon Genesis Evangelion: Ayanami Raising Project
name: Shinseiki Evangelion: Ayanami Ikusei Keikaku
overview: This is a simulation game created by Gainax and BROCCOLI, and based on the anime and manga series Neon Genesis Evangelion. The gameplay is similar to that of the Princess Maker series also developed by Gainax.
